body_html:
The model file only contains the weights of the model.

During execution (and specially during training), we need to keep intermediate activations of the model in order to be able to compute backpropagation. This can take a significant amount of memory, specially if the model is deep.
body_text:
The model file only contains the weights of the model.
During execution (and specially during training), we need to keep intermediate activations of the model in order to be able to compute backpropagation. This can take a significant amount of memory, specially if the model is deep.
body:
The model file only contains the weights of the model.

During execution (and specially during training), we need to keep intermediate activations of the model in order to be able to compute backpropagation. This can take a significant amount of memory, specially if the model is deep.
